risk_report.summary: The shipment of product P1001 is at high risk due to the strike at Bangalore Port, with an estimated delay of 2-3 days and a potential cost impact of $15,000. Immediate escalation actions are required to mitigate the risk.

Notify vendor of potential delay
Expedite delivery upon arrival
Increase monitoring of shipment status
